ComicInfo.Series: Dark Horse Classics: Terror of Godzilla
ComicInfo.Summary: *Overview* Godzilla is tearing up the heart of Tokyo, and the military is powerless to stop him . . . or are they? Here comes Japan's ultimate secret weapon, the Super X! Hold on, it's gonna be a rough ride! In color for the very first time anywhere, this manga classic was originally published by Dark Horse in black and white in 1988.
ComicInfo.Title: Under The Guns of Super-X
ComicInfo.Writer: Kazuhisa Iwata,Mike Richardson,Randy Stradley,Kazuhisa Iwata,Mike Richardson,Randy Stradley
ComicInfo.Penciller: Kazuhisa Iwata,Jim Bradrick,Chris Chalenor,Kazuhisa Iwata,Jim Bradrick,Chris Chalenor
